body_html:
This will fix the build issues seen in #10605 and will make it so you dont have to do a nasty workaround of creating a file in .git/head/branch_ref to get the build working.

It does not fix tf.git_version in this case, but just will make it show up as "unknown"
body_text:
This will fix the build issues seen in #10605 and will make it so you dont have to do a nasty workaround of creating a file in .git/head/branch_ref to get the build working.
It does not fix tf.git_version in this case, but just will make it show up as "unknown"
body:
This will fix the build issues seen in https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/10605 and will make it so you dont have to do a nasty workaround of creating a file in .git/head/branch_ref to get the build working.

It does not fix tf.__git_version__ in this case, but just will make it show up as "unknown"
